mapper.update: UPDATE multi_board SET visitcount = visitcount+1 WHERE idx=#{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatting (regidate, send_id, rece_id, content, room) VALUES (sysdate, #{send_id}, #{rece_id}, #{content},#{room})
mapper.select: select send_id, rece_id, content, to_char(regidate,'PM HH:MI') as regidate from chatting where room=#{0} order by regidate
